combine_names

combine_names.Rd

combine_names

Usage

combine_names(x, target_list, partner_name)

Arguments

x

seed gene name which is included in target list

target_list

target_list is a list contain all the regulons

partner_name

partner genes for combination

Value

Return a comination name list. seed and partner genes are seperated by colon.
